bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Requires that the rate of pay for Members of Congress and Federal officials under the Executive Schedule be determined as if the recommendations of the President on January 5, 1987, relating to such pay rates had been disapproved. Exempts Federal judicial salaries from this disapproval. Provides for recovery of any overpayments attributable to enactment of this Act.
